item.title: Browser tweaks
item.description:
Modifications

Use tweaks from https://justthebrowser.com to remove all the unnecassary nonsense browsers have added to them.

Extensions

Essential browser extensions are:

https://github.com/gorhill/uBlock#ublock-origin

https://privacybadger.org/

http://www.one-tab.com/

Also see notes on Firefox tweaks in the Linux notes section
